body.name: 2 Pack TPLMB Air Purifiers for Bedroom,H13 HEPA Filters,Fragrance Sponge for Better Sleep,Portable Air Purifier with Nightlight Speed Control,For Home Living Room,24dB Filtration System,P60 (2, white)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 2 hrs 26 mins
features: Superior Purification: The P60 air purifier features an H13 HEPA filter,It is beneficial for pet owners, parents of newborns, asthma sufferers, and anyone seeking clean air to breathe.

Enjoy Fragrant Air: The air outlet of the purifier includes a groove where you can add 4-5 drops of your favorite essential oil (not included). As the purifier circulates fresh air, the fragrance fills the room, creating a pleasant and healthy environment for you and your family.

Low Decibel and Night Light: When the fan is set to the lowest speed, the noise level drops to 24 decibels, ensuring a quiet operation without any noticeable sound. Switch to night light mode, and a warm light will illuminate instead of the harsh bedroom lighting, creating a peaceful and comfortable sleep environment.

High Circulation Rate: TPLMB air purifier adopts 360-degree air intake technology and dual pressurized air ducts, which can freshen the air for a room up to 215 square feet/20 square meters per hour, cover every corner of the room, and promote your health.

Official Filter Replacement: Our TPLMB air purifier after 1500 hours of use. A red indicator light will light up to remind you to change the filter. In order to maintain the purification effect, it is recommended that you search for "B0C5F4P9ZV" to purchase official replacement filters. (Other filter elements are not compatible with P60 air purifiers)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Smoke Protection With the development of industry and the increase in the number of cars, more and more smoke will be produced, which constantly affects people's physical health. Get Filter Pollen Protection Whenever flowers bloom, pollen quietly enters our bodies, which can lead to sneezing, itching, and in severe cases, asthma. Get Filter Pet Dander Protection For families, although pets are our good companions, their hair and scent can spread to the air clock, causing us discomfort Get Filter Harmful Particles Protection There are many harmful substances floating in the air that we cannot see, and these particles do not settle, but float under control, constantly affecting our physical health Get Filter
H13 HEPA Filter TPLMB air purifier uses high-efficiency air filters to effectively remove smoke, pet hair, dander, hair, etc. from the air.

Living Room Strong purification of air in a room with many penple, improve air quality. The Kitchen It can purify kitchen fumes, dust, and bacterial particles, making the kitchen clean and hygienic. Home Office Convenient to carry, can be placed anywhere without disturbing your work Bedroom You can experience beauty and tranquility while enjoying the aroma of aromatherapy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this product, not disappointed at all!Sleek, quiet and performs well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great air filter
reviews.reviewText: I used this filter after frying fish in the kitchen and it took out the smell! It is silent and effective!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two for the price of one!
reviews.reviewText: Very good size and compact, great design and not very loud - perfect for desktop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good decent small size air purifier
reviews.reviewText: It was a great bundle deal with two devices and bundled with extra filters (buy separately). The noise sound is excellent and not loud. Easy to operate and average decent quality. Performance could have been a little better, low med high fan power was very close and high fan didn’t feel like much power. Appearance wise it fits with my furniture. Overall quality is 4 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality easy to use
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Love this product. It works as it should love the different settings. This two pack is perfect I have one in my office/cat room and the living room. I use the higher setting in the office area due to the cat litter and cat trees being in there and it works wonders. This is a must have if you're a pet owner. Completely takes away any pet smell that's in the room and reduces dander and dust. The two pack makes it convenient to place one in different parts of the house one can filter enough square footage for more than the room I'm using it in! Another feature I love about these compared to others is the color of the night light. Many other brands use that bright blue light but this one offers a warm orange color that's extremely comforting at night time. Gives a relaxing feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Noticed a difference the very first day! We have a small home and having 2 air cleaners is perfect! We have not had any problems with this product. Love that I can run it all day or set the timer for a few hours. I would definitely recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great air purifier
reviews.reviewText: A great air purifier! Really helps with having pets in the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They're okay but I wouldn't suggest them
reviews.reviewText: The fact that you get two for the price is great but these really aren't that effective. They work okay but I wouldn't really say they eliminate smells/smoke/ect. I have one in a small bedroom and it works okayish. Helps with some pet smells but only kind of. The other is in my living room and it doesn't do much out there but it could be the size of the room. One also runs extremely loud vs the other. Both are set up correctly and are barely weeks old so they certainly shouldn't be making much of any sound. Personally, I'd just suggest you buy a better air purifier.

The media could not be loaded. I am a big fan of these air purifier units.They have a small footprint and can easily fit on a bedside table or on a corner stand in any room.As you will notice from the video, they are exceptionally quiet even on the highest setting, yet our powerful and moving a great amount of air. The ultra quiet fan technology is quite exceptional actually.The filters are easily replaceable and can be found on Amazon as well.It comes with a cord long enough for convenient placement next to an electrical outlet. I also like that it’s designed with USBC as opposed to the older micro USB technology.It used to be well-made of high-quality materials and carries with good warranty and customer service support.Very reasonable value especially for a two pack of machines and I feel that I paid a fair price.I’m very happy with this purchase and would purchase again

This set of air purifiers has been great at picking up dust and all. There is quite a lot of dust in this house which has been picked up by these. The size is good as it does not take up a whole bunch of space. The nice black color also makes it blend in with other furniture. Its not to noisy either and the filter is easy to replace. Overall, good set and value for the price.

A nice piece in my bedroom. It works quietly. It gives fresh air. It looks cute. And it is safe to work alone there with time set. Even one in my kids room I do not worry about they touch it. A welcome one in my family.

After 1 week the cheap little $2 fans (one per unit) are noisy on high (3 speeds) 46 db. The unit has two parts basically, a fan and a filter. The fan is literally the same as the little computer fan you see in a desktop which CAN be quiet (good quality) for a few bucks more and they can be noisy (cheap). These are the cheap kind. I can't, in good conscience recommend this unit because I haven't had it long enough to know how long the fan will last.
